title: Monitoring lines for resource limits and requests on smarta-saw-con pods are too close
content:
The Prometheus dashboard shows that the monitoring line for resource limits is too close to the monitoring line for resource requests on the smarta-saw-con pods.

Cause

This issue might occur due to insufficient memory of the smarta-saw-con pods.

Solution

  1. Run the following command to open the smarta-saw-con resource editor. 
    kubectl edit sts smarta-saw-con -n itsma-a4iax
  2. Change the value of the memory field under limits to a larger value, and then save the update.

    After this change, the saw content pods will restart automatically.

  3. Go to the Prometheus dashboard and check if the monitoring lines for limits and requests are normal.
